pullrequest.title: adding practice worlds for stationkeeping and wayfinding

content.raw:
All looks good to me.

I added some details to the wiki - [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/Phase2\_Task\_Testing\_2019](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/Phase2_Task_Testing_2019)

Are these topics available during competition?

1. station\_keeping: `/vrx/station_keeping/pose_error `
2. wayfinding: `/vrx/wayfinding/min_errors `

I thought that those topics would not be available during scored runs, but I’m not seeing that in the documents.

‌
content.html:
All looks good to me.

I added some details to the wiki - #!/osrf/vrx/wiki/Phase2_Task_Testing_2019

Are these topics available during competition?

  1. station_keeping: /vrx/station_keeping/pose_error
  2. wayfinding: /vrx/wayfinding/min_errors

I thought that those topics would not be available during scored runs, but I’m not seeing that in the documents.
